section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-d200ed4 elementor-section-content-middle elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

div.div: Lone Star Language Academy is a tuition-free charter school with a mission to provide every student an innovative 21st Century learning experience in an environment that is supported by rigorous and engaging instruction and language acquisition that connects to every child’s life experiences.

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-9404b3c elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

div.p: “ I’m very happy with the teachers/staff and am really impressed by the amount of focus and attention they had on the students. The communication is great as well. Definitely recommend Lone Star to anyone who is looking for a different environment for their kids than a typical elementary school. ”

“ I would recommend Lone Star Language Academy to my friends and family because the class sizes are small and there is a lot of diversity. The staff is very approachable and I can ask them anything about my daughters. My kids are getting all the help they need and i feel like i’m getting everything I’ve wanted to get out of this school. ”

“ We are very happy with the school and the staff. The curriculum is very challenging with heavy focus on STEM. The best decision ever. Ms. Otey is my son’s teacher we love her and her style of teaching. ”
“ Amazing school and staff! My son LOVES it! ”

div.class: elementor-element elementor-element-f08b68d alignleft elementor-position-top elementor-vertical-align-top elementor-widget elementor-widget-image-box

div.p: At Lone Star Language Academy, we pride ourselves in the opportunity given to each student to succeed and maintain a rigorous education. Our school is a state-accredited charter school with a quality education that meets the educational needs and learning styles of the students.

div.class: pum pum-overlay pum-theme-10491 pum-theme-lightbox popmake-overlay auto_open click_open
pum-container popmake theme-10491 pum-responsive pum-responsive-medium responsive size-medium

div.p: The health and safety of our students, families and staff are a top priority at LSLA. To that end, the district maintains daily communication with our public health officials as we closely monitor all developments related to COVID-19. Because this is a rapidly evolving situation and guidance is changing daily, LSLA is actively assessing this situation. We will be sharing a comprehensive update for students, families and staff members later this week, so that we are able to follow the most current, reliable and accurate guidance. We will also send any new information and resources via Remind App
